name: Drunkard's Breath
book: Pathfinder 14: Children of the Void. Copyright 2008, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell emanates from your mouth and functions like stinking cloud, except as noted above. The effect is barely visible and does not obscure vision. The nausea effect resembles that of an extreme hangover. This is a poison effect.
components_zh: 言语，姿势，材料（一个臭鸡蛋或卷心菜叶）
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效; 见后文
text_zh: 此法术从你口中扩散，效果除上述外如同臭云术。法术效果几乎不可视且不会阻碍视线。法术造成的反胃效果如同严重宿醉。这是一个毒素效果。凯登·凯连的教会使用此法术驱散人群，比如庆功宴上场面失控之类的场景。
